website_summaries.verdict: The ultra-rugged Cat B15Q is an affordable, unlocked Android smartphone, but weak mobile data support and paltry internal storage hold it back.
cons: No LTE and missing HSPA+ bands for AT&T and T-Mobile

customer_reviews.title: issues
customer_reviews.text: Had it for 2 days and had nothing but problems, shuts off by it self and may take as many as 8 tries to get it on again. Read all the great reviews , love the size and ruggedness but would not work for me. Good luck if you buy one. Update, 12/29/14, After Christmas a friend of mine got one and he has no problems and loves it ..so far..
customer_reviews.author: Bruce A.

customer_reviews.title: Received the phone in time and in exellent packaging. ...
customer_reviews.text: Received the phone in time and in exellent packaging . It's a must buy gadget rugged heavy duty ready for any challenge...that's the way of CAT.
customer_reviews.author: Dubz 🐻🇹🇿

customer_reviews.title: The phone is very hardy and is as easy to use as any other android phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone is very hardy and is as easy to use as any other android phone. The charger port however is small so we've had to cut down the plastic from some of the universal chargers we have in order for them to fit the port.
customer_reviews.author: RLandry

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother. It's been a year since i bought it. He broke the sim card slot. Hard to find a place that could repair it but once I talked to CAT customer service they fixed it for free. Great attention! Really happy.
customer_reviews.author: Juli

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly before said time. Very rugged, and durable phone. It is able to be connected by AT&T, works fine. Amazing phone!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: this cell pone does not recognizes the sd card and ...
customer_reviews.text: this cell pone does not recognizes the sd card and uses only the internal memory. the SDcard is empty but when i try to sabe a picture it reports that the sd card is full. If I try to install another program it also reports that is not enougth memory. I expected to be a ligit ítem since is promoted by Amazon and this is a clone. can anybody tell me what is the next step since I got 2 cell phones.

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life on both the SIM cards
customer_reviews.text: Not a capable phone at all. Very less on board memory, not even enough for installing basic apps. Poor battery life on both the SIM cards, doesn't last even a day. Not recommended for a technology buff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great durable phone.
customer_reviews.text: i got this after returning the previous model (the screen wasn't working right) and this was the greater compromise. it is everything i hoped it would be and more. I thought the camera would be a disappointment considering it is only 5mp but the photos are actually very nice!

customer_reviews.text: really very good! works perfectly for Paraguay, and corrected important part of the problems of the previous version ... especially the little ROM and flash for better pictures

customer_reviews.title: Bought this phone for my husband who takes really good care of it and it didn't even make 6mths ...

customer_reviews.author: gissy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, not the best camera quality but perfect for the outdoors
customer_reviews.author: LEPJ26

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this phone
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this phone! Everyone thinks it has a case on it and I'm like no, that's the phone. I have not dropped it yet but I am not afraid too. I think this phone is a tank. It is a lot faster than my old HTC One VX and more up to date with software. One complaint I have is that I have to play my music through the Google Music app which I don't prefer over the in house music app my HTC had. Overall I'm very pleased, I like how the charger port is on the side and the audio jack port is on top. Loving it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Fudgehog

customer_reviews.title: Didn't received what i ordered, and it is not the toughest cellphone... not even tough...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have the 4 GB of internal memory, it had 2. The power button stucked from a 2 feet height. Useless =(

product_meta.title: CAT B15Q Unlocked GSM Quad-Core Extremely Rugged Touchscreen Phone - Black
product_meta.description: The World's FIRST Globally Available Rugged KitKat smartphone incorporates the latest operating system and a faster Quadcore processor which allows you to enjoy over 1,000,000 apps from the Google Play store. The B15Q comes equipped with Waves MaxxAudio, which delivers high class audio performance throughout the phone, and a dual noise-cancelling microphone that allows for clear conversation even in loud environments. Stormy weather? With this waterproof* phone, you’ll have nothing to worry about. The screen is operable even when wet, giving you maximum performance when you need it most. The B15Q is the epitome of a Rugged phone: it's dustproof, waterproof* and drop proof from 1.8m. All of which means that, whatever life throws at it, this phone's a survivor. The last thing you want is your battery to run out. With the B15Q rugged smartphone you get up to 16.3 hours of talk time. It means no battery worries for you – and no broken-off conversations. IP67 certified: Waterproof* up to 1m for 30 mins Impervious to dust Military Standard 810G: Shock and Drop Temperature Category 4 Vibration Drop Test: Up to 1.8m Operating Temperature: -20°C(-4°F) to 55 °C (131°F) ROM Flash: 4 GB RAM: 1 GB Extended Storage: Supports Micro SD Up to 32 GB (not included)
feature_bullets: 2G: GSM/GPRS/EDGE GSM/GPRS/EDGE Frequencies: 850/900/1800/1900 MHz 3G - WCDMA/UMTS/HSPA: HSPA Frequencies: 3G 850/AWS/1900 NO LTE
Processor: Media Tek, 6582M QUAD CORE 1.3Ghz Platform/OS: Android 4.4 KitKat
Display: 4" WVGA (480x800) Capacitive Multi-touch (2p) Display Cover: Gorilla Glass Wet Finger Tracking
Camera: Auto Focus Main: 5MP + LED flash Secondary/Front Facing: VGA Video Capture: Yes

This device is Carrier-unlocked and may be used with any GSM carrier that uses a frequency or band that this device supports. A SIM card and service plan must be purchased separately. Unlocked GSM phones will not work with CDMA networks like Boost, Sprint or Verizon

Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T and T-Mobile as well as with GSM SIM cards (e.g. H20, Straight Talk, and select prepaid carriers). Unlocked cell phones will not work with CDMA Carriers like Sprint, Verizon, Boost or Virgin.
